original_text: When you have finished reading aloud all the words on the scroll, tie a big stone to it. Throw it all into the middle of the Euphrates river. korean_text: 너는 이 책 읽기를 다한 후에 책에 돌을 매어 유브라데 강 속에 던지며

sentences.original_text: When you have finished reading aloud
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 소리 내어 읽기를 마쳤을 때

sentences.original_text: all the words on the scroll
tie a big stone to it
Throw it all
into the middle of the Euphrates river
